arts.ttl: Everton slow burner finally coming good as agent of chaos shows class
arts.sum: Analysis from Chris Beesley after the Blues' clash with Palace in the Premier League

arts.ttl: Liverpool vs. Wolverhampton Wanderers: Can Arne Slot improve on Everton draw, maintain Premier League title race advantage?
arts.sum: Liverpool will have to improve their performance levels if they are to achieve victory against Wolverhampton Wanderers in the Premier League on Sunday.

arts.ttl: 'What a week' - in-form Everton's revival under Moyes keeps rolling
arts.sum: Everton have picked up more points than any other Premier League team since David Moyes returned to Goodison Park in January.

arts.ttl: Newcastle and Crystal Palace given Double Gameweek 32 in Fantasy
arts.sum: Managers in Fantasy Premier League have a new Double Gameweek to plan for, with Newcastle United's home fixture against Crystal Palace being rescheduled for Wednesday 16 April. Anthony Gordon (£7.6m), Lewis Hall (£5.1m) and Alexander Isak (£9.5m) are being transferred out in considerable numbers, with many Fantasy managers likely having an eye on Newcastle's tricky short-term fixtures and their Blank Gameweek 29.

arts.ttl: Light at the end of the tunnel for Everton - Moyes on new owners
arts.sum: Manager David Moyes is optimistic about Everton's future after the Toffees beat Crystal Palace 2-1 at Selhurst Park.

arts.ttl: David Moyes still wary of relegation zone despite Everton’s win over Palace
arts.sum: New signing Charly Alcaraz snatched an 80th-minute winner on his first Toffees start.

arts.ttl: David Moyes reveals fear over Carlos Alcaraz fitness and substitution dilemma before Everton goal
arts.sum: The Everton manager reacts after the Premier League clash at Palace

arts.ttl: Glasner gives his verdict after Everton defeat
arts.sum: Oliver Glasner said Crystal Palace will work on finding solutions against strong defensive teams, after the Eagles were beaten by Everton following a cruel late twist at Selhurst Park.

arts.ttl: Everton took the chances we gave them - Glasner
arts.sum: Crystal Palace manager Oliver Glasner is frustrated after the Eagles' mistakes cost them in a 1-2 home defeat by Everton at Selhurst Park.

arts.ttl: David Moyes celebrates ‘dream start’ to second Everton stint
arts.sum: David Moyes says he has enjoyed a “dream start” upon his return to Everton after watching his side beat Crystal Palace at Selhurst Park on Saturday. The 2-1 victory means the Toffees have won four out of six Premier League games since the Scot replaced Sean Dyche in the dugout, as well as drawing with […] The post David Moyes celebrates ‘dream start’ to second Everton stint first appeared on The Football Faithful.
